name: DIGGERGUN: Demo
description:
DIGGERGUN is an oppressive platformer about workers, low wages and the environment. After arriving on an island off the coast of Cornwall to work as Engineer, you’re quickly put to work in the lithium mines due to the flexibility clause in your contract. With the Cornwall Mining Corporation demanding a £3,000 fee to terminate your employment contract and take you back to the mainland, you’re left with nothing to do but dig.

KNOWN BUGS - Patch 0.0.1

  • Common: On loading a save, game will flash some text briefly. 
  • Common: On running out of energy, and respawning in bed, the game will flash some text briefly. 
  • Common; Main menu settings for windowed mode may have to be pressed twice to get the desired result. 
  •  Very Rare: After loading a save, main menu may get stuck. You can press "F6" on your keyboard in order to close it. That should fix the issue. 
  • Very rare:  Double-tapping X on the bed, or while sleeping,  may cause the screen to go black after sleeping. This may be linked to using the map, and then immediately running to the bed and pressing X.
  • Very rare:  Sometimes enemies can spawn on top of or close to the player in the mines. Just exit and rejoin the mines.

 Other notes: 

  • If the player hits £0 or lower, the demo currently just continues.  In the final game, you will be able to apply for loans etc.

If you find any bugs, please let us know either by putting a comment below or contacting us on social media.

Thanks for playing everyone! Once again, you like the game, please support us on Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/diggergun/diggergun
